scripts.agent:build: pushd "../shared/agent" && npm run build -- --ide jb && popd
scripts.agent:rebuild: pushd "../shared/agent" && npm run rebuild --ide jb && popd
scripts.agent:watch: pushd "../shared/agent" && npm run watch -- --ide jb && popd
scripts.bundle: npm install --no-save && npm run webview:verify && npm run agent:bundle && tsx esbuild.ts --prod
scripts.bundle:ci: npm run clean:ci && npm run bundle
scripts.clean:ci: git clean -xdf -e licenses/**/* && npm run webview:clean:ci && npm run agent:clean:ci
scripts.mwatch: tmux new-session 'npm run watch' \; split-window -h 'npm run agent:watch'
scripts.preinstall: pushd "../shared/ui" && npm install --no-save && popd && pushd "../shared/agent" && npm install --no-save && popd && pushd "../shared/util" && npm install --no-save && popd  && pushd "../shared/build" && npm install --no-save && popd
scripts.rebuild: npm install --no-save && npm run agent:rebuild && npm run build
